author: GlaucusResearch
content: We are short China Lumena (HKEX:0067), with a price target of HKD 0.00. Our full report is at https://t.co/ktIznTmt5x

author: GlaucusResearch
content: We believe that Lumena’s sales are 90% less than the sales reported to Hong Kong investors and regulators.

author: GlaucusResearch
content: Moody’s withdrew its B2 corporate family rating on Lumena in December 2013: https://t.co/DmcGXoXsU0
